attributes.action: Stop the proposed car-park at The Falkland Gardens in Gosport.
attributes.background: The Falkland Gardens is a scenic spot for families to picnic and watch the ships go by, the plans show a drastic change which will destroy the area. We believe there are more pressing matters for Gosport, that the proposed 'improvements' are unnecessary, and the gardens should be maintained.

rejection.details:
The decision to develop Falkland Gardens appears to be one to be taken by your local council and not the UK Government. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are and how to contact them:
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
